thread.title: What's cooking? Secret substitution for lower carbs: Cauliflower
thread.title_full: What's cooking? Secret substitution for lower carbs: Cauliflower

author: Carol Kimbrough Contributing Writer
title: What's cooking? Secret substitution for lower carbs: Cauliflower
text: Larger font size Posted: Tuesday, October 20, 2015 10:30 pm | Updated: 5:30 pm, Wed Oct 21, 2015. What's cooking? Secret substitution for lower carbs: Cauliflower By Carol Kimbrough We have lived in our home for over 30 years, and we had only had a mouse in it one time. It ran in the back door about 24 years ago, and then it ran right back out. That count is now wrong. In late August, I turned from the entry hall to walk down the main hallway. I thought I saw something skitter, but I couldn’t be sure. It was after midnight, and I hoped it was an active dust bunny or a gecko (not my favorite critter, but better than a snake or a mouse), but I couldn’t be sure. kAmp 4@FA=6 @7 52JD =2E6C[ x E9@F89E x D2H D@>6E9:?8 282:?] w>>>>] $@>6E9:?8 H2D 567:?:E6=J HC@?8 H:E9 >J G:D:@? @C x 925 2 ?6H 9@FD6 8F6DE] x 5:5?’E D2J 2?JE9:?8 E@ 2?J@?6 F?E:= 2 4@FA=6 @7 H666E9:?8 E@ >J 9FD32?5] x 2D<65 9:> :7 96 925 D66? 2?JE9:?8 DEC2?86[ 2?5 96 42=>=J 2D<65 >6 :7 x H2D E2=<:?8 23@FE E96 >@FD6] x AC@>AE=J 2D<65 9:> H92E 96 H2D E2=<:?8 23@FE[ 2?5 96 :?7@C>65 >6 96 925 366?
